translations.translation: He offered it to them and then exclaimed, 'Do you not then eat?'
And placing it before them said: "Won't you eat?"
and laid it before them, saying: “Will you not eat?”
He placed it before them. Then he said, "Why are you not eating?"
He then presented it before them and said, “Do you not eat?”
And placed it before them (saying): "Will you not eat"
So he brought it near them. He said: What! will you not eat?
and he laid it before them saying, 'Will you not eat?'
And he set it before them, saying: Will ye not eat?
and placed it before them. "Will you not eat?" he said,
And he set it before them, and said: wherefore eat ye not?
and put it near them. He said, ‘Will you not eat?’
And placed it before them.. he said, "Will ye not eat?"
And placed it before them, (saying): "Will you not eat?"
He set it before them, saying: 'Will you not eat'
He set it before them. He said, “Will you not eat?”
And placed it near them; he said, "Will you not eat?"
[51:27] and he placed it near them saying, ‘Will you not eat?’: he invited them to eat, but they did not respond.
(And he set it before them) but when he saw that they did not reach to it, (saying: Will ye not eat) the food?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
فذبحه وطبخه { فَقَرَّبَهُ إِلَيْهِمْ } نزلاً
 فأبوا عن أكله
 فعرض عليهم
 وحثهم على الأكل كما هو عادة أرباب الضيافة
 حيث { قَالَ أَلاَ تَأْكُلُونَ } [الذاريات: 27] منه
 فلم يأكلوا بعد العرض والإذن أيضاً

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ فقرَّبه إِليهم } بأن وضعه بين أيديهم حسبما هو المعتاد
 فلم يأكلوا
 فـ { قال ألا تأكلونَ } أنكر عليهم ترك الأكل
 أو: حثَّهم عليه
